articles.title: Energy groups target Biden administration over unwillingness to expand domestic oil production - Fox Business
articles.description: Two prominent American energy groups are targeting the Biden administration over its dismissal of domestic oil and gas production, one with a five figure ad purchase and another whose president will offer testimony before the Senate next week.
